title: Designing Scientific Management Innovation Strategies for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: 5+ years of science-based work experience, understanding of basic management theory
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning, minimal real-time interaction, and immediate applicability to work requirements.

learning_goals: Learners can redesign one or more real-world projects using a scientific problem-solving framework.
Adult learners can collaborate with peer practitioners to complete a business model canvas based on self-directed learning.
Learners can present three or more scientific decision-making processes through case analysis in LMS-based asynchronous discussions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
